QuestData.Title: Sher'KHAAAAAAANNNN!
QuestData.Description: The tigers here have gotten out of control! They're everywhere and meaner than ever!$b$bSher'khaan is the worst of them! He's huge and mean! Maybe a brave adventurer like you could take care of Sher'khaan and the other tigers once and for all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Sharpfang Stalkers and Destroy Sher'khaan.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is it safe to go in the forest again?
QuestData.RewardText: You're so brave! I could never have taken Sher'khaan out on my own!$b$bNow I only have to worry about the scary orcs, giant birds, hippos, big bird men, spiders, everything being on fire...$b$bYa'know maybe I shouldn't be out here all by myself...
